channel.title: Client crash error help
channel.description:
im new to java and when i kill an npc it crashs client and gives me this error anyone help out ? or explain it to me.
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 23113 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:594) at client.build3dScreenMenu(client.java:5701) at client.processRightClick(client.java:7939) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:11352) at client.method146(client.java:15356) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9958) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11210) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:162) at client.run(client.java:5565) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
[/code]

item.title: Client crash error help
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Might possibly be best to narrow down the Npc(s) giving the error and rework their drops.

Read full topic

item.title: Client crash error help
item.dc:creator: @jamespk jamespk
item.description:
@jamespk wrote:

thanks will look into item def.

Read full topic

item.title: Client crash error help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It appears it’s attempting to display a model that’s too high of a value for the ItemDef.

Perhaps the npc is dropping an item that’s not in the client?

Read full topic
